message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this excellent product. Given its value and potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,400,000. I believe this is a fair offer considering the benefits it will bring to your business.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,300,000. This is a competitive price considering the market value and my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your counter-offer and understand your perspective on the market value.  However, the value this product brings, especially tailored to your specific needs, is truly unique. I could consider coming down to $1,375,000, reflecting my willingness to find a mutually beneficial agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm thinking more along the lines of $1,250,000. This is a fair price considering the market value and my budget.

Bob, I understand your position, but your current offer doesn't reflect the true value and potential this product offers you. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last offers at $1,312,500. This is a fair and final offer on my end.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still trying to get the best deal possible. I'm thinking more along the lines of $1,225,000. This is a fair price considering the market value and my budget.
